column5: The digital transformation of business and the emergence of new digital business models have become crucial issues for leaders in the vast majority of organisations. This MSc Digital Business offers you the expertise vital for organisations tackling challenges in this era of digital business.On this Master's degree you will gain a comprehensive understanding of a range of issues including:
